notes.text: We've resolved an issue where the Close button of a column in the flexible column layout wasn't displayed after navigating to an object page
We now support file uploads as action parameters using the Edm.Stream properties.
App developers can now enable the optimistic batch with a controller extension by setting disableRequestCache to False in the manifest.json file
Forms and tables in list reports and object pages now support the Common.Masked annotation
You can now use the quickVariantSelection in the Table building block to define multiple views of a table
We've resolved an issue that prevented editing a draft object, and caused the standard error message not to be displayed
You can now define the mass edit functionality as an aggregation in the Table building block
We now set the correct ValueState on the TextArea during data entry
You can now use the manifest.json file to define custom fragments for a custom list report header
We've resolved an issue where the field validation behaved inconsistently within the flexible column layout applications
We've resolved an issue with the table's selection mode when action groups were added
We now call the onBeforeNavigation extension point when Apply is clicked or a sub-object page is closed in flexible column layout applications
We now show all decimals for quantity with measures in display mode
